DataElement.preferredName: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Axillary Lymph Node Dissection Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of a sentinel lymph node biopsy or axillary lymph node dissection.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Axillary Lymph Node Dissection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to patients who have had sentinel lymph node biopsy or axillary dissection

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Surgical removal and examination of the sentinel node, the lymph node which is first in receiving the lymphatic drainage of a specified anatomic location and is most likely to be affected by the lymphatic spread of cancer.

Concepts.definition: Surgical removal and examination of the sentinel node, the lymph node which is first in receiving the lymphatic drainage of a specified anatomic location and is most likely to be affected by the lymphatic spread of cancer.

Property.preferredDefinition: Surgical removal of the lymph nodes located in the cavity beneath the junction of the arm and the thorax, or axilla (armpit).  This procedure is commonly performed as a component of cancer staging.

Concepts.definition: Surgical removal of the lymph nodes located in the cavity beneath the junction of the arm and the thorax, or axilla (armpit).  This procedure is commonly performed as a component of cancer staging.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Date of SLN biopsy or ALND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of SLN biopsy or ALND
